00023 //----------------------------------------------------------
00024 ThPipeWriter::ThPipeWriter()
00025 : _pipe( 0 )
00026 , _writeRegion( 0 )
00027 , _localOffset( 0 )
00028 , _regionSize( 0 )
00029 {
00030 
00031 }

00033 //----------------------------------------------------------
00034 ThPipeWriter::ThPipeWriter( ThPipe* pipe )
00035 : _pipe( pipe )
00036 , _writeRegion( 0 )
00037 , _localOffset( 0 )
00038 , _regionSize( 0 )
00039 {
00041         if ( pipe )
00042         {
00043                 _regionSize = pipe->GetRegionSize();
00044                 _writeRegion = ( unsigned char* )pipe->GetWriteRegion();
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 //----------------------------------------------------------
00049 ThPipeWriter::~ThPipeWriter()
00050 {
00052         Flush();
00053 }

00060 //----------------------------------------------------------
00061 void
00062 ThPipeWriter::Reset( ThPipe* pipe )
00063 {
00064         _pipe = pipe;
00065         _localOffset = 0;
00066         if ( pipe != 0 )
00067         {
00068                 _regionSize = pipe->GetRegionSize();
00069                 _writeRegion = ( unsigned char* )pipe->GetWriteRegion();
00070         }
00071         else
00072                 _regionSize = 0;
00073 }
00074 
00075 //----------------------------------------------------------
00076 void
00077 ThPipeWriter::WriteString( const tstring& str, bool writeNullTerm )
00078 {
00080         unsigned int lenAdj = writeNullTerm ? 1 : 0;
00081         WriteBytes( str.c_str(), ( unsigned int )str.length() + lenAdj );
00082 }
00083 
00084 //----------------------------------------------------------
00085 void
00086 ThPipeWriter::WriteString( const char* str, bool writeNullTerm )
00087 {
00088         unsigned int lenAdj = writeNullTerm ? 1 : 0;
00089         WriteBytes( str, ( unsigned int )strlen( str ) + lenAdj );
00090 }

00092 //----------------------------------------------------------
00093 void
00094 ThPipeWriter::WriteChar( char ch )
00095 {
00097         *GetWriteLoc< char >() = ch;
00098 
00100         AdvanceOffset( sizeof( char ) );
00101 }
00102 
00103 //----------------------------------------------------------
00104 void
00105 ThPipeWriter::WriteByte( unsigned char ch )
00106 {
00108         *GetWriteLoc< unsigned char >() = ch;
00109 
00111         AdvanceOffset( sizeof( unsigned char ) );
00112 }

00142 //----------------------------------------------------------
00143 void
00144 ThPipeWriter::WriteBytes( const void *buffer, unsigned int count )
00145 {
00147         B_ASSERT( _pipe );
00148 
00150         const unsigned char* src = ( const unsigned char* )buffer;
00151 
00153         unsigned int bytesRemaining = count;
00154         unsigned int copySize = Min( bytesRemaining, ( _regionSize - _localOffset ) );
00155         MemCopy( _writeRegion + _localOffset, src, copySize );
00156         src += copySize;
00157 
00159         while ( bytesRemaining > 0 )
00160         {
00162                 copySize = Min( bytesRemaining, _regionSize );
00163 
00165                 _writeRegion = ( unsigned char* )_pipe->NextWriteRegion();
00166                 MemCopy( _writeRegion, src, copySize );
00167 
00170                 bytesRemaining -= copySize;
00171                 src += copySize;
00172         }
00173 
00175         AdvanceOffset( count );
00176 }
00177 
00178 //----------------------------------------------------------
00179 void
00180 ThPipeWriter::Flush()
00181 {
00183         if ( _localOffset > 0 )
00184                 _writeRegion = ( unsigned char* )_pipe->NextWriteRegion();
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 //==========================================================
00190 //==========================================================
00191 
00192 //----------------------------------------------------------
00193 void
00194 ThPipeWriter::AdvanceOffset( unsigned int count )
00195 {
00197         B_ASSERT( count > 0 );
00198 
00200         _localOffset = ( _localOffset + count ) % _regionSize;
00201         if ( _localOffset == 0 )
00202                 _writeRegion = ( unsigned char* )_pipe->NextWriteRegion();
00203 }
00204 
00205 //----------------------------------------------------------
00206 bool
00207 ThPipeWriter::CrossesRegion( unsigned int count )
00208 {
00209         unsigned int nextOffset = _localOffset + count;
00210         return ( nextOffset > _regionSize );
00211 }
